string.value: You feel bad for #p2101001#. He really wanted to get in the palace... Maybe you can convince #b#p2101004##k to let him in. A fine of #b50000 mesos#k... Sigh, you should pay it off for #p2101001#.\n\n#b50000 mesos#k
#p2101001# still wasn't able to meet his sister but at least they can send letters to each other. But, #p2101004#! That delivery fee was a ridiculous!
Sniff, sniff... Wahh! \r\n#L0# #b #p2101001#! Why are you crying? Didn't you get to see your sister?
#h0#! No, I didn't get to see my sister...\r\n#L0# #b What happened? You had a #t04031582#!

Tigun said...sniff...because I wrote my name in that empty space...sniff...that I can't use that entry pass anymore...sniff. Plus...plus, he said I have to pay a fine for scribbling on such an important pass! He said he'll throw me in prison if I don't! Wah!! I want my sister!\r\n#L0# #b (Oh boy. How did this get so complicated?) Now, now, stop crying. I'll take care of this. How much is the fine?
Sniff... It's #b50000 mesos#k...\r\n#L0# #b(Whoa! That's a lot of money. What a mess...) Do I just give the money to Tigun?
I think so...sniff... Will you really help me?
Sniff, thank you so much. You know where to find #b#p2101004##k, right? He's probably still at the palace entrance. Thank you, #h0#.
Oh... Oh I see... Sniff, sniff... Thanks anyway.

#p2101001#? That little bratty kid?! Ha! I let people in the palace if they have the #b#t04031582##k, but I'll never accept a pass that's been scribbled on like that! Do you know the work I put into those entry passes!? Ha, if he doesn't pay 50000 mesos, I'll throw him in prison!\r\n#L0# #bSigh... Then I'll pay you the 50000 mesos instead.#l
Huh? Really?\r\n#L0# #bUnder one condition. Let that kid, #p2101001#, meet his sister, #p2101008#.#l
I can't do that! She's very important to the queen. She is the queen's storyteller... How about this? I'll deliver letters to her instead... Sound like a good deal?

Very well, hehe. Any time the kid brings me a letter, I promise on my sacred name to deliver it to his sister. If she wrote one for him, I'll give pass it to him, too. I'll collect #b50000 mesos#k as a small delivery fee though.
I'll explain it to #p2101001# when he comes to see me, so you can be on your way. What? Okay ,okay. I won't mention the delivery fee. Hehe.
Did you talk to #b#p2101004##k? He said to bring #b50000 mesos#k if I don't want to go to prison...
What is it? You want to scribble on a #t04031582# too? If you don't want to pay the 50000 mesos, then fine, go to prison.
